content: Hi @Grahame Grieve how do I get the current version of AU base referencing http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base instead of http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base-stu3 ? R4 version should be the current version now...

Hi @Brett Esler , I am exploring IG for Australia and just for confirmation, below are the current available published IG's right ? because I am trying to access 'Release 1 Draft(1.0.1)' from https://registry.fhir.org/guides and its giving 404 not found.
For R4- http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base
For STU3 - http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base-stu3

Hi @Kailash your CI build references are correct; R4 is the current working branch; STU3 CI project is not active and won't be worked on any longer - v1.0.1 seems to have broken content (have not investigated) - for stable STU3 versions http://hl7.org.au/fhir/aubase1.1/ is last stable publication ; http://hl7.org.au/fhir/aubase1/ is the AU balloted version
Hi @Brett Esler How can I get hold of AU R4 profiles? the 'current' version is taking to STU3 of AU profiles
@Shovan Roy I have changed the package-list.json now - @Grahame Grieve since R4 CI is the only current version listed should this work for Shovan now?
thanks @Brett Esler let's wait for @Grahame Grieve to comment.
@Brett Esler I just checked, sounds like the 'current' version is now pointing to R4
